alert.note: Alert for Christian; Macon; Sangamon; Shelby (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 9:33AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Christian, southeastern Sangamon, northwestern Shelby and southern Macon Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 933 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mechanicsburg to near Divernon. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Edinburg around 940 AM CDT. Kincaid, Stonington, Bulpitt and Jeisyville around 950 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Taylorville, Morrisonville, Moweaqua and Assumption. This includes Interstate 55 between mile markers 77 and 85. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
